sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_ebis_value_map"><x_snc_ebis_value_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><attribute_value>*</attribute_value><field_value/><script><![CDATA[(function(jsonObject, attribute) {

	const typeValue = JSON.parse(jsonObject)[attribute];
	const isValidType = new global.GlideQuery('cmdb_rel_type')
		.where('sys_id', typeValue)
		.count() === 1;

	if (!isValidType) {
		throw(`CI Relationship Type with sys_id ${typeValue} does not exist.`);
	} else {
		return typeValue;
	}

})(jsonObject, attribute);
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_snc_ebis_value_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.van.damme</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-05 13:51:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>16c0f12647664610abf1d9ca516d4398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Scripted field value - *</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer" source="x_snc_ebis">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_ebis_value_map_16c0f12647664610abf1d9ca516d4398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.van.damme</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-05 14:00:27</sys_updated_on><use_script>true</use_script></x_snc_ebis_value_map></record_update>
